body:
From kubectl we saw:

```
$ kubectl get pods l7-lb-controller-5sdcm --namespace=kube-system
NAME                     READY     STATUS    RESTARTS   AGE
l7-lb-controller-5sdcm   0/2       Running   2          36m
```

```
$ kubectl describe pod l7-lb-controller-5sdcm --namespace=kube-system
Name:               l7-lb-controller-5sdcm
Namespace:          kube-system
Image(s):           gcr.io/google_containers/defaultbackend:1.0,gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.1
Node:               yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl/10.240.0.25
Start Time:         Thu, 25 Feb 2016 01:34:18 +0000
Labels:             k8s-app=glbc,kubernetes.io/cluster-service=true,name=glbc,version=v0.5.1
Status:             Running
Reason:             
Message:            
IP:             10.244.3.8
Replication Controllers:    l7-lb-controller (1/1 replicas created)
Containers:
  default-http-backend:
    Container ID:   rkt://28fdda34-c6d8-40bb-859b-1bd5eda222a3:default-http-backend
    Image:      gcr.io/google_containers/defaultbackend:1.0
    Image ID:       rkt://sha512-9abe60da0597010d5e003cfff11a51c4e57daf563c38077cb21b117fee31e650
    QoS Tier:
      cpu:  Guaranteed
      memory:   Guaranteed
    Limits:
      cpu:  10m
      memory:   20Mi
    Requests:
      cpu:          10m
      memory:           20Mi
    State:          Waiting
    Last Termination State: Terminated
      Reason:           Completed
      Exit Code:        0
      Started:          Thu, 25 Feb 2016 01:34:18 +0000
      Finished:         Mon, 01 Jan 0001 00:00:00 +0000
    Ready:          False
    Restart Count:      1
    Environment Variables:
  l7-lb-controller:
    Container ID:   rkt://28fdda34-c6d8-40bb-859b-1bd5eda222a3:l7-lb-controller
    Image:      gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.1
    Image ID:       rkt://sha512-440555dfb4a9ae3c9445a30cc4e000eb1e81fd3d7672f574b7df0606a794c094
    QoS Tier:
      cpu:  Guaranteed
      memory:   Burstable
    Limits:
      memory:   100Mi
      cpu:  100m
    Requests:
      cpu:          100m
      memory:           50Mi
    State:          Waiting
    Last Termination State: Terminated
      Reason:           Completed
      Exit Code:        0
      Started:          Thu, 25 Feb 2016 01:34:18 +0000
      Finished:         Mon, 01 Jan 0001 00:00:00 +0000
    Ready:          False
    Restart Count:      1
    Environment Variables:
Conditions:
  Type      Status
  Ready     False 
Volumes:
  default-token-1neqx:
    Type:   Secret (a secret that should populate this volume)
    SecretName: default-token-1neqx
Events:
  FirstSeen LastSeen    Count   From                SubobjectPath               Reason      Message
  ─────────   ────────    ───── ────                ─────────────             ──────      ───────
  35m       35m     1   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Pulling     pulling image "gcr.io/google_containers/defaultbackend:1.0"
  35m       35m     1   {default-scheduler }                            Scheduled   Successfully assigned l7-lb-controller-5sdcm to yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl
  35m       35m     1   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Pulled      Successfully pulled image "gcr.io/google_containers/defaultbackend:1.0"
  35m       35m     1   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{l7-lb-controller}   Pulling     pulling image "gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.1"
  34m       34m     1   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{l7-lb-controller}   Pulled      Successfully pulled image "gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.1"
  34m       34m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Created     Created with rkt id 462fd938
  34m       34m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Started     Started with rkt id 462fd938
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Killing     Killing with rkt id 462fd938
  34m       33m     3   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{l7-lb-controller}   Unhealthy   Liveness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Created     Created with rkt id 59a157c5
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Started     Started with rkt id 59a157c5
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Created     Created with rkt id 28fdda34
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Started     Started with rkt id 28fdda34
  33m       33m     3   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Pulled      Container image "gcr.io/google_containers/defaultbackend:1.0" already present on machine
  33m       33m     3   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{l7-lb-controller}   Pulled      Container image "gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.1" already present on machine
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Created     Created with rkt id d7693b36
  33m       33m     2   {kubelet yifan-rkt-minion-ubcl} spec.containers{default-http-backend}   Started     Started with rkt id d7693b36
```

But on the node, `rkt list` shows the containers are running:

```
$ sudo /opt/rkt/rkt list
UUID        APP         IMAGE NAME                          STATE   CREATED     STARTED     NETWORKS
88d26ee2    heapster        gcr.io/google_containers/heapster:v0.18.2           running 33 minutes ago  33 minutes ago  kubenet:ip4=10.244.3.10, default-restricted:ip4=172.16.28.10
ba5fd04f    kubernetes-dashboard    gcr.io/google_containers/kubernetes-dashboard-amd64:v0.1.0  running 37 minutes ago  37 minutes ago  kubenet:ip4=10.244.3.3, default-restricted:ip4=172.16.28.3
d7693b36    default-http-backend    gcr.io/google_containers/defaultbackend:1.0         running 35 minutes ago  35 minutes ago  kubenet:ip4=10.244.3.8, default-restricted:ip4=172.16.28.8
        l7-lb-controller    gcr.io/google_containers/glbc:0.5.1     
```

cc @sjpotter @kubernetes/sig-node

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: Container state is not updated correctly for rkt pods
